availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Andrew Jackson Ingram (Bath County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Morgan County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Isaac Ingram and Elizabeth Ingram. Married to Mary Elizabeth Williams Ingram in Bath County, Kentucky, on April 30, 1854. Father of John Ingram, Robert Ingram, Reason Ingram, Jasper N. Ingram, Sarah Ingram, and George Williams. Attended school in Bath County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Morgan County, Kentucky, in 1860.

Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994050, Morgan County Births.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Bath County Marriages, Film 000273007.
KYR-0001-020-0135.
